Portal 2 is a quality game just like all of Valve's releases. The co-op mode is a great way to yell and laugh with your friends while enjoying the physics and puzzles of the old game along with some new concepts just to make it more interesting. And the story mode while also closing out the lore of the game, adds a whole new layer of thinking while you try and solve all the puzzles. But the story is much longer than the last game. And I will warn you to not play this game for too long at a time. Or else you'll start preemptively whining before you even get to the next puzzle. I give it a 4/5.
